asw1013.util

Class TweetListFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • asw1013.util.TweetListFile

  • public class TweetListFile
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class to read and write data from the XML file of tweets. This class is a singleton (only one instance per JVM is allowed) to solve concurrency problems.

    • Method Summary
